body_html:
Farmhash's pull request google/farmhash#8 to detect the ppc64le has been merged to google/farmhash repo.
But looks like the latest tensorflow does not build farmhash as it used to do earlier. So, config.guess and config.sub are not used at all. However, I think it is worth updating farmhash commit hash in the tensorflow/workspace.bzl.

I have generated a pull request updating the farmhash commit hash in tensorflow #4597.
body_text:
Farmhash's pull request google/farmhash#8 to detect the ppc64le has been merged to google/farmhash repo.
But looks like the latest tensorflow does not build farmhash as it used to do earlier. So, config.guess and config.sub are not used at all. However, I think it is worth updating farmhash commit hash in the tensorflow/workspace.bzl.
I have generated a pull request updating the farmhash commit hash in tensorflow #4597.
body:
Farmhash's pull request https://github.com/google/farmhash/pull/8 to detect the ppc64le has been merged to google/farmhash repo.
But looks like the latest tensorflow does not build farmhash as it used to do earlier. So, config.guess and config.sub are not used at all. However, I think it is worth updating farmhash commit hash in the tensorflow/workspace.bzl. 

I have generated a pull request updating the farmhash commit hash in tensorflow https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/4597.
